attributes.action: Stop giving housing, money, vouchers, cars ... etc to imigrants who do not contribute to this country send them home, if they are not working.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to stop letting all these people in to the country. why have the Goverment wasted so much money on housing for these people, why do we as tax payers have to foot the bill for these people who, doss about and do not work.  why is it they have more rights then people born here. The Goverment needs to stop doing what the EU says and put a no vacancy sign up.. bring in tougher border controls.   if you do not have money to live here GO AWAY..  other countrys do it.. now we need to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
